articles.content: SPOKANE, Wash. - As the novel coronavirus surges amid hasty re-openings in states across the U.S., some state officials have ordered residents to wear masks in public, and one medical expert’s widely… [+6843 chars]

articles.title: Most people with coronavirus won’t spread it, why do few infect many? - Deccan Herald
